abstract: Lawmakers condemn lax penalties meted out to Drug Enforcement Admin agents accused of participating in sex parties with prostitutes and misusing government funds while stationed in Colombia; agents involved in sex parties were given suspensions of two to 10 days.
lead_paragraph: Portions of a Justice Department report released by the House panel described investigations against 10 D.E.A. agents for sexual misconduct and the misuse of government funds over several years.

headline.main: Anger Over Reports of D.E.A. Agents’ Parties, and Bewilderment at Mild Penalties
headline.print_headline: Anger Over Penalties for D.E.A. Agents Who Went to Sex Parties

snippet: Portions of a Justice Department report released by the House panel described investigations against 10 D.E.A. agents for sexual misconduct and the misuse of government funds over several years.
